channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: China Announces a Ban on Rare Minerals to the U.S.
item.description: The move comes a day after the Biden administration expanded curbs on the sale of advanced American technology to China.

item.title: Asia now exports culture, ideas, tech and leadership

item.title: What Kash Patel Could Do to the F.B.I.
item.description: The true danger is almost less about the pick and more about what it says of Trump’s approach to his second term.

item.title: An Indigenous Group in Quebec Tries to Keep the Caribou Alive
item.description: The Canadian government is threatening to use emergency measures to protect three caribou herds at risk of dying out in Quebec.

item.title: Elon Musk’s $50 Billion Tesla Pay Can’t Be Reinstated, Delaware Judge Rules
item.description: The judge said she would not reverse her decision to strike down the package after Tesla shareholders approved it a second time.

item.title: Trump trading Mar-a-Lago for Paris this weekend with a VIP pew at Notre Dame’s grand reopening
item.description: This marks President-elect Donald Trump's first foreign trip since winning re-election in November.

item.title: Jaguar boss defends rebrand amid ‘Miami Pink’ EV launch: ‘More people have been talking about Jaguar for the last two weeks than for so much longer’
item.description: "We want to be bold and disruptive... We're clearly in the conversation,” Jaguar's managing director Rawdon Glover said.
